SEARCH
Package Core.Managers

Class RenderManager

java.lang.Object
Core.Managers.RenderManager
public class RenderManager extends Object
The RenderManager class manages rendering operations, including initializing shaders, binding models, preparing entities, rendering lights, and rendering entities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RenderManager()
    Constructs a new RenderManager instance with a reference to the WindowManager.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    bind(Model model)
    Binds the specified model, enabling vertex attribute arrays and setting material and texture.
    void
    cleanup()
    Cleans up resources, including shader cleanup.
    void
    clear()
    Clears the color and depth buffers for rendering.
    void
    init()
    Initializes the RenderManager by creating and linking shaders, and setting up uniforms.
    void
    prepare(Entity entity, Camera camera)
    Prepares an entity for rendering by setting transformation and view matrices.
    void
    processEntity(Entity entity)
    Processes an entity for rendering by adding it to the list of entities for its model.
    void
    render(Camera camera, DirectionalLight directionalLight, PointLight[] pointLights, SpotLight[] spotLights)
    Renders entities with specified lights and camera.
    void
    renderLights(Camera camera, PointLight[] pointLights, SpotLight[] spotLights, DirectionalLight directionalLight)
    Renders lights, including ambient light, point lights, spot lights, and directional light.
    void
    unbind()
    Unbinds the currently bound model, disabling vertex attribute arrays.

  • Constructor Details

    • RenderManager

      public RenderManager()
      Constructs a new RenderManager instance with a reference to the WindowManager.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init() throws Exception
      Initializes the RenderManager by creating and linking shaders, and setting up uniforms.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during initialization.

    • bind

      public void bind(Model model)
      Binds the specified model, enabling vertex attribute arrays and setting material and texture.
      Parameters:
      model - The Model to bind.

    • unbind

      public void unbind()
      Unbinds the currently bound model, disabling vertex attribute arrays.

    • prepare

      public void prepare(Entity entity, Camera camera)
      Prepares an entity for rendering by setting transformation and view matrices.
      Parameters:
      entity - The Entity to prepare.
      camera - The Camera used for rendering.

    • renderLights

      public void renderLights(Camera camera, PointLight[] pointLights, SpotLight[] spotLights, DirectionalLight directionalLight)
      Renders lights, including ambient light, point lights, spot lights, and directional light.
      Parameters:
      camera - The Camera used for rendering.
      pointLights - An array of PointLight objects.
      spotLights - An array of SpotLight objects.
      directionalLight - The DirectionalLight object.

    • render

      public void render(Camera camera, DirectionalLight directionalLight, PointLight[] pointLights, SpotLight[] spotLights)
      Renders entities with specified lights and camera.
      Parameters:
      camera - The Camera used for rendering.
      directionalLight - The DirectionalLight object.
      pointLights - An array of PointLight objects.
      spotLights - An array of SpotLight objects.

    • processEntity

      public void processEntity(Entity entity)
      Processes an entity for rendering by adding it to the list of entities for its model.
      Parameters:
      entity - The Entity to process.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the color and depth buffers for rendering.

    • cleanup

      public void cleanup()
      Cleans up resources, including shader cleanup.
